verbose_text: The experiments presented here have been carried out primarily in FaDu cells, but the G 2 arrest and changes in Plk1 and Cyclin B1 expression following panobinostat treatment of synchronised cells have been confirmed in UMSCC-1 and UMSCC-47, demonstrating that the G 2 arrest caused by panobinostat treatment observed in our studies is not specific to a particular cell line.
